text.tspan: Polarized light microscopy analysis: For each type of material identified by examination of sample at low magnificalion.
Mount spacially dispersed sample in 1.550 RI liquid. (if using dispersion staining, mount in 1.550 HD.) View at 100X
with both plane polarized light and crossed polars. More than one fiber type may be present.
angles of stage rotation with crossed
If fibers are twisted and exhibit
Examine two additional prepared slides at 100X and 450X
Figure 1-1. Flow chart for analysis of bulk samples by polarized light microscopy.
